page.title: 11Local Industry,Earlston
page.content: The{main industry}is{farming}as there are a lot of farms around. In the village there is a sawmill which is supplied with timber from the many forests in the Border region. A quarry in the area supplies rocks for road construction and other such things. There are two civil engineering companies based in the village. We have a small woollen finishing factory. In the industrial estate there are several small units -the largest being a garage which specialises in car body repairs . There is also an agricultural engineering workshop and a plant hire operator . There is a builders firm in the area which does a lot of work around the Borders.
